Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in faded added white outline with added red centre; exterior: at rim, dot band between brown lines; reserved below.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0995) (phase 2)
